home_marquee: WELCOME TO GYNECOLOGICAL DISEASE DETECTION EXPERT SYSTEM
home_subtitle: Expert system for diagnosing PCOS and UTI.
card1_desc: GDDES is an expert system designed to detect gynecological conditions such as Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) and Urinary Tract Infections (UTI).
card2_desc: At GDDES, we care deeply about women's health. Our vision is to bridge the gap between technology and accessible healthcare.
card3_desc: Reach out to us for inquiries, collaborations, or support regarding GDDES.
title: PCOS Diagnosis
burning_label: Burning of urethra, itch, swelling of urethra outlet
about_gddes_paragraph_1: Welcome to GDDES (Gynecological Disease Diagnosis Expert System) — a visionary initiative that combines the power of machine learning and modern healthcare to assist in the early detection of gynecological disorders, with a primary focus on PCOS (Polycystic Ovary Syndrome) and UTI (Urinary Tract Infection).
about_gddes_paragraph_2: GDDES leverages state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms to analyze user input in the form of medical parameters and symptoms, then generates intelligent predictions about the user’s potential condition. It’s more than just a tool — it’s an interactive expert system that empowers individuals to take control of their health
about_gddes_paragraph_3: We continue to enhance GDDES with better models, smarter diagnostics, and broader disease coverage — because we believe that every woman deserves access to quality health insights, right at her fingertips.
